title: Smart Lights
description: Optimizes the light in a scene runtime to maintain a high FPS!
longDescription:
A New lightweight system to optimize all of your lighting in your scene. Think of it as a backup plan that runs real time and measures your FPS to optimizes all the lights in your scene when needed. It has 3 different types of lights that can be used in different scenarios. All of these lights communicate and optimize themselves when FPS has dropped below a target value that the user specifies. This system will active and deactivate lights when in a zone that the user setups. When in these zones and activated the lights will then talk to the system to optimize themselves! To learn how to use this system you need about 20 mins in a full instructional video below. 20 mins you say? well the video is to provide you on how to use the lights properly in different use cases and how to get the most performance out of this system. I would recommend watching the full video first before purchasing. Don't worry its easy to use!


IMPORTANT: No written documentation. Documentation would be hard to cover how this fully functions. That's why there is a full 20 min video showing you all the different cases and how to use this system properly.


Change Log:

Version 1.1

Various fixes including a new Smart Zone Helper Tool and now have a option to "Use Zones Only" which allows the use of the zones but no optimization is applied to the light.


Version 1.5

Various improvements with the feature to automatically convert all of your normal lights in your scene to smart lights with the click of a button. Check out Version 1.5 Video Below


Version 2.0

All Smart Lights will trace for walls and set the zones for you.

New improved workflow. Better Stability. Check out Version 2.0 Video Below


Version 3.0

Coming Soon!

Various Improvements Including a new Light type called snapshot. No more shadows popping in! this will save static shadows on the walls so when fps drops it switches from dynamic to static lighting!


Be sure to check back for future updates.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Optimizes the Light in your scene Realtime
  • Three Different Light types for different scenarios
  • Monitors your FPS and optimizes all of the smart lights in a scene.
  • Â Specify your target FPS Goal
  • Smart Zone Helper Tool helps to speed up workflow. Check out Version 1.5 Video Below
  • Convert All Lights in a Scene to smart lights. Check out Version 1.5 Video Below
  • Smart Echo can speed up workflow for automatically setting up zones. Check out Version 2.0 video below


Number of Blueprints: 7

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No
